en.storyText: We met on a rainy Tuesday in a small coffee shop in Florence. Michael was reading Dante, and Emma was sketching the view from the window. A spilled cappuccino brought us together, and we've been inseparable ever since.
en.venueDescription: Nestled in the heart of Tuscany's wine country, Villa Bellacorte is a 16th-century estate surrounded by rolling hills and vineyards. The villa offers breathtaking views of the Chianti landscape and provides the perfect romantic setting for our special day.
en.joinUsText: Your presence would make our day complete. Please let us know if you'll be able to celebrate with us.
en.templatePreview: This is a preview of the Classic Elegance template
en.togetherWith: Together with our families, we invite you to celebrate our wedding

gr.templatePreview: Αυτή είναι μια προεπισκόπηση του προτύπου Κλασική Κομψότητα
gr.createYourOwn: Δημιουργήστε τη Δική σας Ιστοσελίδα Γάμου
gr.togetherWith: Μαζί με τις οικογένειές μας, σας προσκαλούμε να γιορτάσετε τον γάμο μας
